answers.answer: This is a diabetes forum; please post in the correct forum if you want a response.

question: I just wanted to clear few confusions with regards to the Palpitations that occur post CABG... Are these normal. My Father underwent a CABG around 4 months ago, He is doing fine.. His health is also stable, However, He sometimes experience palpitations. but now it happens frequently. The cardiologist diagnosed the situation and concluded it to be normal. So, Please guide whether this is eventually a normal process post CABG.. Thanks...Regards,Mohammed.
title: Is Palpitations Normal post CABG !!
